  <br>
</h1>

<p align="center">
  Mini Lib C<br>
    Dynamic ELF library to replace the standard Lib C.
</p>

---

## Usage

Close the repo

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Leorevoir/MiniLibC-Assembly.git
```

Install dependencies packages with Nix

```nix
nix develop
```

Build the project

```bash
make
```

**Grade**: `A` with `100% tests passed`.

---
